TABLE.NAME: coursecertificate
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the course certificate activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: template
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the template for this certificate.

FIELD.NAME: automaticsend
FIELD.COMMENT: Automatic certificate send setting.

FIELD.NAME: expires
FIELD.COMMENT: Expiry date setting.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: bidenable
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag for indicating support for BankID signing, or not

FIELD.NAME: bid_service_url
FIELD.COMMENT: BankID Web service URL. Test: https://appapi2.test.bankid.com Prod: https://appapi2.bankid.com

FIELD.NAME: bid_service_auth
FIELD.COMMENT: Auth function enpoint

FIELD.NAME: bid_service_sign
FIELD.COMMENT: Sign function enpoint

FIELD.NAME: bid_service_collect
FIELD.COMMENT: Collect function enpoint

FIELD.NAME: bid_service_cancel
FIELD.COMMENT: Cancel function enpoint

FIELD.NAME: s_ssn
FIELD.COMMENT: Student SSN used for signing this certificate

FIELD.NAME: t_ssn
FIELD.COMMENT: Teacher SSN used for signing this certificate

FIELD.NAME: uvd
FIELD.COMMENT: userVisibleData (base64) used when signing this certificate

FIELD.NAME: unvd
FIELD.COMMENT: userNonVisibleData (base64) used when signing this certificate

FIELD.NAME: cd
FIELD.COMMENT: completionData (json) from successful sign operation
